title: Britain's Got Talent 2019, live semi-final 3, recap: Heartstring-tugging pensioners and affable comedians are standout acts
text:
Heartstring-tugging pensioners and affable comedians were some of the standouts from another night of live BGT action, with Colin Thackery and Kojo Anim grabbing spots in this weekend’s grand final.

Colin the shameless crowdpleaser marches on

An 89 year old war veteran singing We’ll Meet Again against a backdrop of pictures of his lovely late wife is about as manipulative as talent shows get, but it would be impossible not to warm to Chelsea pensioner Colin Thackery. “Thank you for such a beautiful performance that really captures the heart of this show,” said Alesha Dixon, while David Walliams went further and said he thought Colin could win the whole thing. And we will indeed meet Colin again...
